description: Surrogate key uniquely identifying this import configuration record.
Short code identifying the source/profile this mapping applies to.
Path where incoming fuel or fluid transaction files are retrieved for processing.
Flag indicating the file layout type: delimited versus fixed‑width.
Field separator used when the file is delimited.
Controls trimming or padding of leading zeros on identifiers; likely an encoded option value; confirm with SME.
Toggle to enforce product codes against the master catalog during import.
Filter mode code specifying whether matching records are processed or skipped; likely enumerated; confirm with SME.
Code denoting the expected calendar format of transaction dates in the file.
Code denoting the expected clock format of transaction times in the file.
Position index of the field used for the filter criteria in delimited files.
Start character position of the filter field for fixed‑width files.
End character position of the filter field for fixed‑width files.
Position index of the equipment/vehicle identifier in delimited files.
Start character position of the equipment/vehicle identifier for fixed‑width files.
End character position of the equipment/vehicle identifier for fixed‑width files.
Position index of the fuel card or account number in delimited files.
Start character position of the fuel card/account number for fixed‑width files.
End character position of the fuel card/account number for fixed‑width files.
Position index of the transaction date in delimited files.
Start character position of the transaction date for fixed‑width files.
End character position of the transaction date for fixed‑width files.
Position index of the transaction time in delimited files.
Start character position of the transaction time for fixed‑width files.
End character position of the transaction time for fixed‑width files.
Position index of the odometer or hourmeter reading in delimited files.
Start character position of the odometer/hourmeter reading for fixed‑width files.
End character position of the odometer/hourmeter reading for fixed‑width files.
Position index of the driver identifier in delimited files.
Start character position of the driver identifier for fixed‑width files.
End character position of the driver identifier for fixed‑width files.
Position index of the transaction receipt or ticket number in delimited files.
Start character position of the receipt/ticket number for fixed‑width files.
End character position of the receipt/ticket number for fixed‑width files.
Position index of the volume dispensed in delimited files.
Start character position of the volume dispensed for fixed‑width files.
End character position of the volume dispensed for fixed‑width files.
Number of decimal places to apply when parsing the dispensed volume.
Position index of the unit cost in delimited files.
Start character position of the unit cost for fixed‑width files.
End character position of the unit cost for fixed‑width files.
Number of decimal places to apply when parsing the cost value.
Position index of the fueling location or vendor name in delimited files.
Start character position of the fueling location/vendor for fixed‑width files.
End character position of the fueling location/vendor for fixed‑width files.
Position index of the product type (fuel grade, oil, DEF) in delimited files.
Start character position of the product type for fixed‑width files.
End character position of the product type for fixed‑width files.
Position index of the storage tank or pump identifier in delimited files.
Start character position of the storage tank/pump identifier for fixed‑width files.
End character position of the storage tank/pump identifier for fixed‑width files.
Position index of the state/province where the transaction occurred in delimited files.
Start character position of the state/province for fixed‑width files.
End character position of the state/province for fixed‑width files.
Free‑text notes about this import configuration.
System timestamp when this configuration record was last updated.
Timestamp of the most recent user‑initiated update; appears duplicative of the system value; confirm with SME.
User account that created this configuration.
Timestamp when this configuration was created.
User account that last modified this configuration.
Timestamp when this configuration was last modified.
